result.execSummary:
The defendant Hollis Jones was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: No contact with Pick N Save listed in the criminal complaint.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Hollis Jones

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Hollis Jones in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Lucas Paul Bennewitz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Plea Colloquy.
Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.

4 days Jail (Credit - 4 days)  TIME SERVED
No contact with Pick n Save listed in the criminal complaint.

Costs:  $253.00 to be paid at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 7-1-15.  Failure to pay the court orders 6 days jail.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Hollis Jones in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  
Court Vacates Stayed Warrant.

Defendant needs to pay off $180 in Restitution.

  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Hearing on May 12, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Attorney Jorge R Fragoso in court.   Defendant Hollis Jones did not appear at 10:44 a.m..    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense has had contact with his client but does not know why he is not present. Defense requests another date.   Court ordered a capias stayed until next court date. Defense to let the Court kow on the next date how this matter will proceed.  Hearing scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 6, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Hollis Jones in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Jayne Davis Dewire appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense requests another date for plea/sentence in 2 -3 weeks. Court grants request.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Hollis Jones
Current: 2445 N. 22nd Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 04-15-2015)
Prior: 2522 W Wells St, Milwaukee, WI 53233
Notice of Hearing returned, for hearing scheduled on: 4/15/15, 3/12/15 and 3/11/15.
Hearing on April 15, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness/business listed in the Criminal Complaint.   Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Hollis Jones in court, in custody, with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.   Andrea M. Will appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense requests bail be modified to a signature bond.  State objects to any modification. Court modifies bail to signature bond of $500.00 with same conditions. Court will give another date. 



  Hearing scheduled for April 15, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Defendant's motion for bail modification filed by Attorney Fragoso.
Bail/bond hearing on March 12, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Hollis Jones in court, in custody, with attorney Nicole Masnica for attorney Jorge R Fragoso.   Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense requests another date. Defense needs more information on this case. Atty. Masnica requests this matter be put on tomorrow for a bail motion hearing. Atty. Fragoso to file a bail motion. Court grants request.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for March 12, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Hearing on March 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness/business listed in the Criminal Complaint.   Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.
  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.

Defendant Hollis Jones in court, in custody, with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.   Timothy F. Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant allowed non-collect calls.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for March 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
